author: Kagan Tumer and Joydeep Ghosh
title: Robust Combining of Disparate Classifiers through Order Statistics

In Section 5 we present the performance of order statistic combiners on a real world sonar problem [15], and several data sets from the Proben1/UCI benchmarks [4, 25]. Section 6 discusses the implications of using linear combinations of order statistics as a strategy for pooling the outputs of individual classifiers. 2
